action.action-desc: Ms. Salazar (for herself, Mr. Alford, Ms. Titus, Mr. Webster of Florida, Mr. Panetta, and Ms. Van Duyne) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require air carriers to transfer funds to a ticket agent for cancelled or significantly delayed or changed flights within the time required for air carriers and ticket agents to provide refunds to passengers, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Flight Refund Fairness Act.

section.header: Refunds for cancelled or significantly delayed or changed flights
section.text: Section 42305(e) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking promptly and inserting , not later than the date described in subsection (b),; and

subparagraph.text: by striking A refund and inserting the following:

In providing refunds under this subsection, a ticket agent shall provide such a refund to an individual not later than 7 days after the ticket agent receives the funds transferred by the air carrier or foreign air carrier.
in subparagraph (B), as designated by paragraph (2), by striking subsections (b) and and inserting subsection.
